channel.title: [PI]Arrow Glitch
channel.description:
so i found this weird arrow glitch where if you have say dragon arrows in your bank and and you also have some equipped, then have a different type like rune in your inventory, take out dragon arrows from you bank into your inventory, then equip the rune arrows and you should get this...
[IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g324/blessedabyss/arrowglitch.jpg[/img]
I have looked all over Google and can't seem to find the answer to this, could somebody help me out?

item.title: [PI]Arrow Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

ahh thats funny

i would fine your remove( void
and

if (playerHasItem(removeId, 1)) {
playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(removeId)] += amount;
} else {
addItem(removeId, playerEquipmentN[slot]);
}

sorry its in delta… not PI

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Arrow Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Well I could do that, but what would be the point? I am looking at a prevention measure for this.

Anybody got any idea why it is doing this and how to fix?
